summary: Johnny Kelly, who plans on resigning from the police force and leaving his wife the next day, has a very eventful last night on duty.
cast: Gig Young|Mala Powers|William Talman|Edward Arnold|Chill Wills|Marie Windsor|Paula Raymond|Otto Hulett|Wally Cassell|Ron Hagerthy|James Andelin|Tom Poston|Bunny Kacher|Philip L. Boddy|Thomas Jones|Leonard Diebold|Roy Barcroft|Helen Gibson|Gil Herman|Clark Howat|Tom Irish|Walter Woolf King|Kurt Kupfer|Tom Steele|Dale Van Sickel|Emmett Vogan
title: La ciudad que nunca duerme
